subSections.title: Readings
subSections.text:
{{ja-readings
|goon=しょう<しやう
|kanon=せい
|toon=さん
|kun=い-きる, い-かす, い-ける, う-む, う-まれる, うま-れる, うま-れ, お-う, は-える, は-やす, き-, なま-, な-る, な-す, む-す
|nanori=あさ, い, いき, いく, いけ, うぶ, うまい, え, おい, ぎゅう, くるみ, ごせ, さ, じょ, すぎ, そ, そう, ちる, なば, にう, にゅう, ふ, み, もう, よい, りゅう
}}

subSections.title: Compounds
Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|なま|yomi=k}}

From {{inh|ja|ojp|sort=なま|-}}.  Numerous derivatives already in use in the {{w|Heian period}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

subSections.title: Noun
Prefix
Etymology 2
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|せい|yomi=o}}

From {{der|ja|ltc|-|sort=せい}} {{ltc-l|生|gloss=alive; fresh; raw; unprocessed}}.

subSections.title: Noun
Suffix
Etymology 3
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|き|yomi=k}}

Likely a contraction from {{m|ja|生き|tr=iki||life, living; freshness}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>
